question5.label: Do I have an appointment scheduled in the next few days to begin or continue my pregnancy follow-up?

languageSelection.title: Our mission is to support every pregnant woman throughout her pregnancy.

followup.urgencyText: This is a medical emergency: Call 15 or go to the nearest maternity emergency department to see a midwife or a doctor.

month1.title: 1st month of pregnancy
month1.text: You've been pregnant for 1 month. Congratulations!

month2.title: 2nd month of pregnancy
month2.text: You've been pregnant for 2 months. Congratulations!

month3.title: 3rd month of pregnancy
month3.text: You've been pregnant for 3 months. Congratulations!

month4.title: 4th month of pregnancy
month4.text: You've been pregnant for 4 months. Congratulations!

month5.title: 5th month of pregnancy
month5.text: You've been pregnant for 5 months. Congratulations!

month6.title: 6th month of pregnancy
month6.text: You've been pregnant for 6 months. Congratulations!

month7.title: 7th month of pregnancy
month7.text: You've been pregnant for 7 months. Congratulations!

urgency.title: For your health and that of your child, it is urgent to consult a professional
urgency.explanation:
They will advise you on your delivery, and on the essential examinations related to your pregnancy. 

This consultation is free, and without an appointment

information_modal.title: NATA is here to help and guide you through your pregnancy, but it does not replace medical follow-up.
information_modal.content: In France, it is possible to have free pregnancy monitoring even without medical coverage and without resources.

pregnancyFollow.title: My pregnancy follow-up
pregnancyFollow.noFollowUp: No appointments have been recorded yet
